cs.ualberta.CMPUT301F14T08.stackunderflow.fragments

Class PostFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • cs.ualberta.CMPUT301F14T08.stackunderflow.fragments.PostFragment
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnswerFragment, QuestionFragment

    public abstract class PostFragment
extends Fragment
    This Fragment will help display all questions (Questions and Answers) When a user wants to view a question they are shown this screen. Here the user may view and modify the upvote's as well as favorite or unfavorite the post. The user may also view the post body, username of the author of the post and view a picture of the users problem if there is one as well as view how ever many answers there are to a given question.
    Author:
    Cmput301 Winter 2014 Group 81
